channel.title: Commands!?!
channel.description:
i got my test scape to work i just want commands! ie: p hat gold santa ownage armor.... etc rare armors so please provid the following.....
1:develpment command codes, 2:where to put the command codes!
ps:plzoplz

item.title: Commands!?!
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

a command is somehting like this

if (command.startsWith("NAME")) { ACTION }

we put these under
an existing command … search in client java for command.StartsWith

Read full topic
